languages.text: "Решение далось мне нелегко. Но в этом предложении я увидел возможность служить интересам Человечества даже более эффективно, чем в Навис Империалис. Не мне рассказывать вам, сколь удивительной особой была Лорд-капитан Теодора. Я увидел в ней настоящего лидера и созидательную силу, создавшую свой протекторат среди опасностей и дикости {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}.

traits.locale_text: "Решение далось мне нелегко. Но в этом предложении я увидел возможность служить интересам Человечества даже более эффективно, чем в Навис Империалис. Не мне рассказывать вам, сколь удивительной особой была Лорд-капитан Теодора. Я увидел в ней настоящего лидера и созидательную силу, создавшую свой протекторат среди опасностей и дикости {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}.
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "It was a difficult choice for me. But I saw in the offer a chance to serve the interests of Humanity even more effectively than in the Navis Imperialis. You do not need me to tell you just how remarkable a person Lord Captain Theodora was. I recognised her at once as a true leader and formidable creative force, one who had built a protectorate amidst the dangers and wildness of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Решение далось мне нелегко. Но в этом предложении я увидел возможность служить интересам Человечества даже более эффективно, чем в Навис Империалис. Не мне рассказывать вам, сколь удивительной особой была Лорд-капитан Теодора. Я увидел в ней настоящего лидера и созидательную силу, создавшую свой протекторат среди опасностей и дикости {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}.

You do not need me to tell you just how remarkable a person Lord Captain Theodora was. I recognized her at once as a true leader and formidable creative force, one who had built a trade empire amidst the dangers and wildness of the Koronus."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

You do not need me to tell you just how remarkable a person Lord Captain Theodora was. I recognised her at once as a true leader and formidable creative force, one who had built a protectorate amidst the dangers and wildness of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “对我而言那是个困难的抉择，但在我看来，那也同样是个机会，让我可以更好地为人类服务，比在帝国海军服役时做出更多贡献。相信您不需要我告诉您西奥多拉领主舰长是个多么了不起的人。我一眼就看得出来，她是位真正的领袖，拥有无人能及的创造力。她在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的众多威胁之中，建起了属于她自己的王朝。”
languages.original_text: "It was a difficult choice for me. But I saw in the offer a chance to serve the interests of Humanity even more effectively than in the Navis Imperialis. You do not need me to tell you just how remarkable a person Lord Captain Theodora was. I recognised her at once as a true leader and formidable creative force, one who had built a protectorate amidst the dangers and wildness of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “对我而言那是个困难的抉择，但在我看来，那也同样是个机会，让我可以更好地为人类服务，比在帝国海军服役时做出更多贡献。相信您不需要我告诉您西奥多拉领主舰长是个多么了不起的人。我一眼就看得出来，她是位真正的领袖，拥有无人能及的创造力。她在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的众多威胁之中，建起了属于她自己的王朝。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "It was a difficult choice for me. But I saw in the offer a chance to serve the interests of Humanity even more effectively than in the Navis Imperialis. You do not need me to tell you just how remarkable a person Lord Captain Theodora was. I recognised her at once as a true leader and formidable creative force, one who had built a protectorate amidst the dangers and wildness of the Expanse."

languages.text: «Fue una decisión difícil para mí. Pero su oferta representaba una oportunidad de servir a los intereses de la Humanidad de forma aún más eficaz que en la Navis Imperialis. No necesita que le diga lo notable que era la Lord Capitán Theodora. Reconocí al instante que era una líder nata y una fuerza creativa imparable que había creado un protectorado entre los peligros y los mundos indómitos de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}».
languages.original_text: "It was a difficult choice for me. But I saw in the offer a chance to serve the interests of Humanity even more effectively than in the Navis Imperialis. You do not need me to tell you just how remarkable a person Lord Captain Theodora was. I recognised her at once as a true leader and formidable creative force, one who had built a protectorate amidst the dangers and wildness of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Fue una decisión difícil para mí. Pero su oferta representaba una oportunidad de servir a los intereses de la Humanidad de forma aún más eficaz que en la Navis Imperialis. No necesita que le diga lo notable que era la Lord Capitán Theodora. Reconocí al instante que era una líder nata y una fuerza creativa imparable que había creado un protectorado entre los peligros y los mundos indómitos de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「私にとっては難しい選択でした。しかし、この申し出には、帝国宇宙軍よりもさらに効果的に人類の利益に貢献できるチャンスがあると思ったのです。ロード・キャプテン・シオドーラがどれほど優れた人物であったかは、私が語るまでもないでしょう。私は彼女こそが真の指導者であり、強大な創造力を持ち、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}の危険と荒野の中で保護領を築き上げた人物であることをすぐに認識したのです」
languages.original_text: "It was a difficult choice for me. But I saw in the offer a chance to serve the interests of Humanity even more effectively than in the Navis Imperialis. You do not need me to tell you just how remarkable a person Lord Captain Theodora was. I recognised her at once as a true leader and formidable creative force, one who had built a protectorate amidst the dangers and wildness of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「私にとっては難しい選択でした。しかし、この申し出には、帝国宇宙軍よりもさらに効果的に人類の利益に貢献できるチャンスがあると思ったのです。ロード・キャプテン・シオドーラがどれほど優れた人物であったかは、私が語るまでもないでしょう。私は彼女こそが真の指導者であり、強大な創造力を持ち、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}の危険と荒野の中で保護領を築き上げた人物であることをすぐに認識したのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Die Entscheidung ist mir schwergefallen. Doch ich sah in dem Angebot die Chance, den Interessen der Menschheit effektiver zu dienen als in der Navis Imperialis. Ihr müsst mir nicht sagen, welch bemerkenswerte Person Lord Captain Theodora war. Ich habe sie augenblicklich als wahre Anführerin und formidable kreative Gewalt erkannt, als Schöpferin eines Protektorats inmitten der Gefahren und Wildnis der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g}."
languages.original_text: "It was a difficult choice for me. But I saw in the offer a chance to serve the interests of Humanity even more effectively than in the Navis Imperialis. You do not need me to tell you just how remarkable a person Lord Captain Theodora was. I recognised her at once as a true leader and formidable creative force, one who had built a protectorate amidst the dangers and wildness of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Die Entscheidung ist mir schwergefallen. Doch ich sah in dem Angebot die Chance, den Interessen der Menschheit effektiver zu dienen als in der Navis Imperialis. Ihr müsst mir nicht sagen, welch bemerkenswerte Person Lord Captain Theodora war. Ich habe sie augenblicklich als wahre Anführerin und formidable kreative Gewalt erkannt, als Schöpferin eines Protektorats inmitten der Gefahren und Wildnis der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g}."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai longuement hésité avant de prendre ma décision, mais finalement, j'ai vu dans cette proposition une chance de servir les intérêts de l'humanité encore plus efficacement que dans la Navis Imperialis. La seigneure-capitaine Théodora était une femme remarquable, comme vous le savez déjà. Il m'est immédiatement apparu qu'elle était une véritable dirigeante, doublée d'une formidable force créative qui avait bâti un protectorat parmi les dangers et la sauvagerie des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "It was a difficult choice for me. But I saw in the offer a chance to serve the interests of Humanity even more effectively than in the Navis Imperialis. You do not need me to tell you just how remarkable a person Lord Captain Theodora was. I recognised her at once as a true leader and formidable creative force, one who had built a protectorate amidst the dangers and wildness of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai longuement hésité avant de prendre ma décision, mais finalement, j'ai vu dans cette proposition une chance de servir les intérêts de l'humanité encore plus efficacement que dans la Navis Imperialis. La seigneure-capitaine Théodora était une femme remarquable, comme vous le savez déjà. Il m'est immédiatement apparu qu'elle était une véritable dirigeante, doublée d'une formidable force créative qui avait bâti un protectorat parmi les dangers et la sauvagerie des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g}. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Benim adıma zor bir karar oldu. Fakat Navis İmperialis bünyesinde İnsanlık için hizmet etmenin, bu teklifi kabul etmem hâlinde bulunacağım konuma nazaran daha zor olacağına kanaat getirdim. Lord Kaptan Theodora'nın ne denli fevkalade biri olduğunu zaten biliyorum. Hakiki bir lider ve gerçek bir mucitti. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik'in{/g} tehlikeleri ve yabanıllığına karşın protektorasını inşa etmeyi başarmıştı."
languages.original_text: "It was a difficult choice for me. But I saw in the offer a chance to serve the interests of Humanity even more effectively than in the Navis Imperialis. You do not need me to tell you just how remarkable a person Lord Captain Theodora was. I recognised her at once as a true leader and formidable creative force, one who had built a protectorate amidst the dangers and wildness of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Benim adıma zor bir karar oldu. Fakat Navis Imperialis bünyesinde İnsanlık için hizmet etmenin, bu teklifi kabul etmem hâlinde bulunacağım konuma nazaran daha zor olacağına kanaat getirdim. Lord Kaptan Theodora'nın ne denli fevkalade biri olduğunu zaten biliyorum. Hakiki bir lider ve gerçek bir mucitti. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik{/g}'in tehlikeleri ve yabani doğasına karşın protektorayı inşa etti."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
